concept.title: Notes
concept.abstract: This abstract has a shortdesc inline. This topic shows different types of note elements. More abstract.

section.title: Informative Notes
section.p: This section contains plain note, attention, tip, and important types. Most note content is from the DITA 1.1 Language Spec.
section.note: Please pay extra attention to this note.
This is a fine little tip.

section.title: Cautionary Notes
section.p: This section contains caution, warning, and danger notes. The Warning type is an addition in DITA 1.2 required to support US standard ANSI Z535 and other international standards.
section.note: Watch out for hazards to life and limb.
Important! Be aware of this before doing anything else.

section.title: Other Notes
section.p: This section contains fastpath, remember, restriction, and the "other" note type.
section.note: This note will speed you on your way.
Don’t forget to do what this note says.
You can't do what this note says.
This is something other than a normal note.
